casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Teasley, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Teasley, 99 Ohio St.3d 1226, 2003-Ohio-4047.]

(No. 2002-1298 Submitted June 3, 2003 Decided August 13, 2003.) Ron O’Brien, Franklin County Prosecuting Attorney, and Susan E. Day, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Andrew P. Avellano, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The certification of conflict is dismissed, sua sponte, as having been improvidently certified; there is a want of a conflict.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor and O’Donnell, JJ., concur.
